Title: Junction
Produced by:
Chad A. Verdi 
 Aaron Kaufman 
 Anthony Gudas 
 Michelle Verdi 
 Chad Verdi Jr. 
 Paul Luba 
 Bryan Greenberg 
 Garrett Bates
Starring:
Bryan Greenberg 
 Ashley Madekwe 
 Jamie Chung 
 Sophia Bush 
 Griffin Dunne
Production companies:
Verdi Productions 
 Public School Productions 
 Hyperborea Pictures 
 La Salle Productions
Production: In May 2022, it was announced that Peck and Ho were cast in the film.
Principal photography took place in Rhode Island.
Release: In January 2024, it was announced that VMI Releasing acquired the United States distribution rights to the film, which was initially scheduled to be released in theaters and on VOD on January 24, 2024.  The release date was changed to January 26, 2024.
